remarks: The reciprocal of an infinite product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jan-2018.)
statement:
prodfn0.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
prodfn0.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
prodfn0.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) =/= 0 ) $.
prodfrec.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( 1 / ( F ` k ) ) ) $.
prodfrec $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( x. , G ) ` N ) = ( 1 / ( seq M ( x. , F ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
